title: Did Belucci say that Trump could not take power because he was one of the "common people "?
subtitle: The President of the United States House of Representatives, Nancy Belosi, is the frequent target of deception and misleading amulets.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The President of the United States House of Representatives, Nancy Belosi, said that the political class would not accept the President of the United States, Donald Trump, among its ranks, because he was not "a polite politician" and he was among the "common people."
